data.meta_description: Prints of MARIA CHRISTINA (1806-1878). Queen Maria Christina of the Two Sicilies. Our beautiful Wall Art and Photo Gifts include Framed Prints
data.text:
Granger Photo Prints and Wall Art

MARIA CHRISTINA (1806-1878). Queen Maria Christina of the Two Sicilies. Queen consort of Spain

MARIA CHRISTINA (1806-1878).

Queen Maria Christina of the Two Sicilies. Queen consort of Spain and wife of Ferdinand VII. Queen Maria Christina inspecting the troops. Oil on canvas, 1865-66, by Mariano Fortuny. Granger holds millions of images spanning more than 25,000 years of world history, from before the Stone Age to the dawn of the Space Age.

Media ID 12416266

1865 1866 Bradley Smith Carriage Cavalry Christina Consort Horse Drawn Horseback Inspection Maria Mariano Queen Sicily Spain Spanish Fortuny Troop

Framed Prints

Bring timeless elegance to your home or office with our exquisite framed print of Queen Maria Christina of the Two Sicilies, a captivating portrait by artist 140_1698725 from Granger Art on Demand. This stunning image showcases Queen Maria Christina (1806-1878) in her regal attire, inspecting her troops as queen consort of Spain and wife of Ferdinand VII. Each print is meticulously framed to preserve the intricate details and vibrant colors of the original artwork. Add this beautiful piece to your collection and elevate the atmosphere of any room with its rich history and classic beauty.

Photo Prints

Add a touch of regal elegance to your home decor with our exquisite photographic print of Queen Maria Christina of the Two Sicilies. This stunning image, captured by Granger Art on Demand under the reference 140_1698725, portrays Maria Christina (1806-1878) in her role as queen consort of Spain and wife of Ferdinand VII. As she inspects her troops with a confident and resolute expression, Maria Christina embodies the strength, grace, and power of the monarchy. Our high-quality photographic print brings the rich history and intrigue of this remarkable woman to life, making it a captivating addition to any room in your home or office.

Poster Prints

Bring history to life with our exquisite poster prints from the Media Storehouse collection. This captivating image, titled "Maria Christina (1806-1878). Queen Maria Christina of the Two Sicilies. Queen consort of Spain and wife of Ferdinand VII. Queen Maria Christina inspecting the troops," is a masterpiece by Granger Art on Demand (140_1698725). Depicting Queen Maria Christina of the Two Sicilies, this poster print showcases her regal presence as she inspects her troops with unwavering determination. A stunning addition to any room, this high-quality poster print is a testament to the rich history and artistry of the past. Order yours today and let the story of Queen Maria Christina inspire you every day.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Discover the rich history and intrigue of the past with our exquisite Maria Christina jigsaw puzzle from the Media Storehouse collection. Featuring the captivating portrait of Queen Maria Christina of the Two Sicilies (1806-1878) by Granger Art on Demand, this puzzle invites you to bring the grandeur of the 19th century to life. As Queen consort of Spain and wife of Ferdinand VII, Maria Christina's strength and determination shines through in this stunning image. Immerse yourself in the puzzle's intricate details and relive the stories of the past. A perfect gift for history buffs and puzzle enthusiasts alike.
